deny_list.name: python2
deny_list.reason: Python2 isn't recommended to be used on Graviton instances due to performance reasons

deny_list.name: amd64
deny_list.reason: Package name with amd64 is likely not meant for arm64/Graviton

deny_list.name: x86_64
deny_list.reason: Package name with x86/x86_64 is likely not meant for arm64/Graviton
